# Libraries
```{r}
library(skimr)
library(DataExplorer)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggExtra)
library(dplyr)
```


# Load and Clean Dataset
```{r}
agencies <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2025, week = 7)$agencies
```

# Initial Exploration
```{r}
# DataExplorer::create_report(agencies)
```

## Bar Plots
```{r}
agencies %>% group_by(state) %>% 
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(count)) %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_bar(aes(x = count, y = reorder(state, count)), 
           width = 0.6,
           stat = "identity")
```
